Title: The Snackrifice
Description:
They took my grummles! Hozen don't eat grummles, but yeti do. And the Knucklethumps have a yeti.

Please rescue my grummles. Cut them down or let them out of cages. Rescue them any way you can.

Many fortunes and rewards if you do this.
ObjectivesText: Rescue 5 Imprisoned Grummles by cutting them down or releasing them from cages.
CompletionText:
Other grummles say I not have good luck. The call me "Luckydon't".

But now I have friend $r who is a big luckydo! We'll show them.
RewardText:
Today is a day of many good and bad fortunes. Bad fortune that hozen stole my grummles. Good fortune that my $r saves my grummles. Bad fortune that so many hozen must die to learn lesson. Good fortune that $rs are luckydos and know how to fight.

Grummles are not fighters. We carry, we explore, and we are content.
